author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixed the tests that were failing when running from Maven (but working inside Eclipse).

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-3243 (jdbc net client) exception during normal iteration through "ResultSet" of "select * from t"

author: dandiep
msg: Make a not found target type which results in a 404.

author: jeremias
msg: Add support for special object formatters (where toString() isn't good enough). ATM, it's hard-coded but could later be hooked into dynamic discovery if we have multiple such formatters. The SAX Locator is the only example for now.

author: amassari
msg: SchemaInfo now makes a copy of the targetNSUri to avoid pointing to deleted memory if the corresponding SchemaGrammar gets deleted early; the schema URL is now replicated inside the constructor instead of relying on the caller to pass a duplicated string
